title: Monokrom
content:
Monokrom is a small Norwegian type foundry run by [Frode Bo Helland](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Frode%20Bo%20Helland), [Sindre Bremnes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Sindre%20Bremnes) and [Hans Ivar Stordal](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225215/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hans%20Ivar%20Stordal).

They launched their [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204225215/http:/www.monokrom.no/) in December 2012.
author: Frode Bo Helland
